title: Why are there so many new homes being built when there are so many homes on the market forclosers, bank owend and still thay keep building? Seams like all of wilmington is forsale.
text:
Because developers need to make money, and they do that by developing
new properties and building new homes. When the housing market
crashed, most of the sales stopped, but even though some developments
are on hold, some are still in the process of building, and that's
what you're seeing. In effect, developers are banking on new homes
sales to increase. And so they'll keep building new homes if they see
a market for that.
